# tmleExtract

The goal of `tmleExtract` is to extract parameter estimtes from TMLE fits produced by the [`tmle`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tmle/index.html) package in a tidy format.

## Installation

You can install with:

`devtools::install_github("nt-williams/tmleExtract")`

## Example

Basic example: 

```{r}
library(tmleExtract)

set.seed(1)
n <- 250
W <- matrix(rnorm(n*3), ncol=3)
A <- rbinom(n,1, 1/(1+exp(-(.2*W[,1] - .1*W[,2] + .4*W[,3]))))
Y <- A + 2*W[,1] + W[,3] + W[,2]^2 + rnorm(n)
tmle_fit <- tmle::tmle(Y,A,W, Q.SL.library = "SL.glm", g.SL.library = "SL.glm")

tmle_extract(tmle_fit, A, Y)
```
